Fani: Kayode falsely claims in his post that the video is from the opening of the Democratic State of Florida's Congress and represents the new American government.
The video has been verified as authentic: It has been circulating online since December 2014 and was recorded before a City of Lake Worth commission meeting in Florida. The man in the video is identified as atheist Preston Smith, who delivered an invocation to various gods, including Satan. Some commissioners present at the meeting left the room before Smith began speaking.
